sentences.en: Article 11 No damaged , defiled, or substandard National Emblem shall be hung.
sentences.cn: 第十一条不得悬挂破损 、 损或者不合规格的国徽.

sentences.en: I don't think these substandard products will easily get past the inspection.
sentences.cn: 我不认为这些次品能轻易地通过检验.

sentences.en: In contrast , much of China's domestic vaccine production is considered substandard.
sentences.cn: 该研究所位于菩那,是一家私人公司.

sentences.en: MPPE was notorious for selling substandard diesel.
sentences.cn: MPPE因出售劣质柴油而臭名昭著.

sentences.en: New York Life became the first company to insure substandard risks.
sentences.cn: 纽约人寿成为首家提供次健康人保险的公司.

sentences.en: Producers in the Chinese animation are all substandard.
sentences.cn: 中国的动画市场存在制作厂商不求上进的问题.

sentences.en: She has written good essay before, but this one is substandard.
sentences.cn: 她以前写的文章不错, 但这一篇却不怎麽样.

sentences.en: The cold has made already substandard living conditions even worse.
sentences.cn: 寒冷使得已经较差的生活环境变得更糟糕。

sentences.en: The rate of substandard products should not exceed 5 %.
The reputation of the firm was blown upon for passing substandard products off as first - class merchandise.
sentences.cn: 该公司因把次品当正品出售而名誉扫地.

sentences.en: Too many families are still living in substandard housing.
sentences.cn: 仍有太多家庭居住条件达不到标准.

sentences.en: Your food, water, and sanitary facilities are acutely substandard.
sentences.cn: 你们的食物, 水和卫生设备都比一般标准低得多.

sentences.en: Your inadequate pronunciation contributes to making your writing substandard.
sentences.cn: 你的不合格的发音将导致你的书写也不能令人满意.

sentences.en: Yunnan Baiyao ( farinaceous ) how is injury of remedial abrade substandard used?
sentences.cn: 云南白药 ( 粉状 ) 治疗擦伤等外伤怎么用?

trans.tran_cn: 不够标准的，在标准以下的，低等级标准
trans.tran_en: not as good as the average, and not acceptable
